description: This trek expands on the easy and fun trek up Heart Creek to bring you to the source of the water that feeds the hidden falls.
directions: Park at the Heart Creek Trailhead and  parking lot which is just to the west of the Lac des Arcs / Heart Creek interchange and is accessible by both east and west bound traffic on the TransCanada highway.  The site is about 15 km east of Canmore, 80 km west of Calgary.The authorities have been trying for many years to discourage parking in the ditch by Heart Creek for environmental reasons. Please respect this and use the proper trailhead.
title: Heart Creek Source
